meanings.definition: A type of skateboard that is longer and typically used for cruising and transportation.
meanings.sent1: I saw a group of friends riding longboards at the park.
meanings.sent2: Longboards are great for gliding smoothly along the sidewalk.
meanings.sent3: Why did the longboard go to school? To get a higher education!
meanings.sent4: Her longboard became her trusty steed, carrying her through the bustling city streets.
meanings.sent5: The longboard's sleek design made it stand out among the other skateboards.

meanings.definition: To ride or use a longboard for recreational purposes.
meanings.sent1: I love to longboard along the beach boardwalk on sunny days.
meanings.sent2: She longboards in the park every weekend to relax and unwind.
meanings.sent3: Why did the longboard refuse to go to the party? It was tired of rolling around all day!
meanings.sent4: His mind longboarded through memories of carefree summer days.
meanings.sent5: Longboarding down the hill felt like flying with the wind in her hair.
